attributes.action: Dismiss the minister or party worker who used a 4 letter word about General Dannatt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the McBride affair it is disgraceful that Labour apparatchiks are still engaged in spin and lies. We demand that the Prime Minister dismiss the Minister or party official who referred to General Sir Richard Dannatt by a 4 letter word.
